metadata.name: Suspicious CustomShellHost Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of CustomShellHost binary where the child isn't located in 'C:\Windows\explorer.exe'

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\customshellhost.exe')) AND NOT lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\explorer.exe'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of CustomShellHost binary where the child isn't located in 'C:\Windows\explorer.exe'
